WorkItem.Description:
VS project, that describes how to create Custom controls with DependencyProperty (inherited from System.Windows.Controls.Control or System.Windows.Controls.UserControl).
It should describe difference between control and Templated control
It should describe how to set TwoWay TemplateBinding for Templated control and a lot of other tips ({Binding RelativeSource={RelativeSource TemplatedParent}, Path=TAG, Mode=TwoWay})
It should describe how to implement validation and coercion of new values (something like this: http://blog.ningzhang.org/2008/11/dependencyproperty-validation-coercion_14.html)
It should contain snippets for simple and full implementation of DependencyProperty
Â 
Custom controls and DependencyProperty is a very important topic and it should be covered well.
